snippet: Christian Ballard and Gregory Westbrooks assert that the players association knew but did not disclose the dangers of hits to the head.
abstract: Retired football players Christian Ballard and Gregory Westbrooks sue NFL Players Assn for concealing from them information about dangers of repeated head hits; lawsuit echoes hundreds of similar cases against the NFL and may represent a new front in the legal battle over concussions in sports.
lead_paragraph: Christian Ballard and Gregory Westbrooks assert that the players association knew but did not disclose the dangers of hits to the head.

headline.main: Two Ex-Players Say Players Union Withheld Information
headline.print_headline: Two Ex-Players Say Players Union Withheld Information
